Subject: EvidenceLine
Slot Definition: A relationship between an assertion or proposition and an evidence line used in evaluating its validity.

Subject: Agent
Slot Definition: A relation between an information content entity and an agent who made a contribution to its information content, or to its subsequent modification or assessment.

Subject: Document
Slot Definition: A relation that holds between an evidence line and a citable document from which information supporting the evidence line was obtained (i.e. a "supporting reference").
